ygData.subject: Re: Trade Skills in general and Jewelry Craft in specific...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well as some know I am a lvl 23 enchanter on Xegony server have have been doing a few test with Charisma and our spells being resisted. My natural CHA is 90.
ygData.messageBody:
Well as some know I am a lvl 23 enchanter on Xegony server have have been
doing a few test with Charisma and our spells being resisted. My natural CHA
is 90. With a magic amulet of plus 5 CHA and sympathetic aura I have a CHA
of 117. I have noticed that I am resisted almost 30% less then when I do not
have any Charisma altering spell/items on, so if you all have any other
information regarding this please let me know.

Leaokk Darkclaw
